de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.im.evaluate.example.file

Class FileImvEvaluationUnit

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.im.evaluate.AbstractImEvaluationUnitIetf

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.im.evaluate.ImvEvaluationComponent, de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.im.evaluate.ImvEvaluationUnit

    public class FileImvEvaluationUnit
extends de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.im.evaluate.AbstractImEvaluationUnitIetf
implements de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.im.evaluate.ImvEvaluationUnit
    Example file IMV evaluation unit, which uses a property file to obtain reference values for an evaluation.
